Class LivingBeing

    • Entities.Entity

extends Entity
implements java.lang.Comparable
    LivingBeing are entity that have heathPoint

        public LivingBeing​(float x,
                   float y,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   int maxHealthPoints,
                   int armorPoints,
                   int radius)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - x initial position of the living being
        y - y initial position of the living being
        height - the height of the living being
        width - the width of the living being
        maxHealthPoints - maximum health points of the living being
        armorPoints - armor points of the living being
        radius - the collision radius

      • LivingBeing

        public LivingBeing​(float x,
                   float y,
                   int maxHealthPoints,
                   int armorPoints,
                   int radius)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        x - the initial the coordonate of the being
        y - the initial second coordonate of the being
        maxHealthPoints - the maximum amout of hp of this being
        armorPoints - the quantity of armor of this being
        radius - the hitbox radius of this being
